SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.animal

Class AnimalSelectionDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.animal.AnimalSelectionDisplay
Direct Known Subclasses:
AirAnimalSelectionDisplay, LandAnimalSelectionDisplay, WaterAnimalSelectionDisplay
public abstract class AnimalSelectionDisplay extends Object
Base class that represents the common functionality for animal selection screens. Manages the UI components for all types of animal selection.
